mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, type, text, image_ids, video_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{text}, #{imageIds}, #{videoId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId} Limit #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_like WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post p JOIN user_follow uf ON p.user_id = uf.following_id WHERE uf.follower_id = #{userId}
